remarks: Append an additional value to a function.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fmptap.0a $e |- A e. _V $.
fmptap.0b $e |- B e. _V $.
fmptap.1 $e |- ( R u. { A } ) = S $.
fmptap.2 $e |- ( x = A -> C = B ) $.
fmptap $p |- ( ( x e. R |-> C ) u. { <. A , B >. } ) = ( x e. S |-> C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
$d S x $.
